Name: Space Warden
About the game: SPACE WARDEN is Top-Down space action shooter where you as a Space Warden are fighting in the war. The Game will offer various of different missions where you escorting ships, destroying space caravans, destroying enemy bases or trying to defend your own base before enemy attacks. We leave Earth long time ago (app. at year '2580'), after years searching for a new home we found the solar system which consisted of 12 planets and 2 of which were habitable, since we had no other option we land on one of them. After several generation on this planet, almost half of the population had moved to a second planet only a few light years away from us. We came across a new planet that contained a new raw material, discovery of this started a war. This material is the reason why this war started and has been going on, for generations... Single-player Campaign With 10 Missions. + BONUS MiSSION Destructive Environment Use a Lot of different Weapons Ultra RAY, tools including Digger, or Automated Turrets. Game length is around 90-120 minutes.
